channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Imagination Unleashed: Activating AI To Manifest Our Ideas
item.description: Part of what makes AI such a valuable creative partner is its ability to aggregate and synthesize large amounts of information at amazing speeds.

item.title: Carbon Removed: How XPRIZE Winners Aim To Reshape The Climate
item.description: The $100 million XPRIZE Carbon Removal is a moonshot challenge to pull carbon out of the sky—or the sea, or the soil—and lock it away. Permanently.

item.title: Why The Thousand Brains Theory Could Hold The Key To True AGI
item.description: Despite advancements, AI has yet to achieve continuous, lifelong learning and the ability to generalize from experience.

item.title: AI Depends On Your Precious Data: Don't Lose Control Over It
item.description: Maintaining control over your data isn't a limitation; it’s what ensures your long-term success.

item.title: The Hidden Challenges Of Global Retail Expansion And How To Prepare For Them
item.description: Here, I share some of the most common challenges I’ve seen retailers face during international expansion and how you can begin building a strategy to ...

item.title: Simple and painless productivity
item.description: On the factory floor, productivity increases are relentlessly implemented, often without regard for worker satisfaction. For people working with a lap...

item.title: Technical debt and AI slop
item.description: Technical debt is easy to incur. It’s unnecessary added features, undocumented code, support for outmoded interactions and anything that slows down yo...

item.title: Good instincts
item.description: Sometimes, in the absence of data or useful experience, we’re left to act on our instincts. It’s worth noting that other people have instincts as well...

item.title: Work ethic vs discipline
item.description: A solid work ethic drives someone to show up, even when they’d rather not. If there’s work on their desk, they’ll take it on. Discipline, on the other...

item.title: The steps vs. the concept
item.description: If you memorize the steps, you have a direct, simple and fast path to obtain the result. Until the world changes. Even the tiniest shift in the system...
